Class GameDrawingPanel

  • java.lang.Object

      • java.awt.Container

          • asteroids.GameDrawingPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

     class GameDrawingPanel
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    The GameDrawingPanel class extends JComponent and contains the objects that will be used in the game. It is essentially the game panel.
    Author:
    Casey Scarborough
